'''24w05b''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.20.5]], released on February 1, 2024, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{snap|24w05b|February 1, 2024|id=b}}</ref>

== Changes ==
'''[[Effect]]s'''
* Potion effect amplifiers are now restricted between 0 and 127.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=24w05b
|;From released versions before 1.20
|118857|Effect amplifier is read/written as byte from NBT despite being stored as an integer.
|228486|Cannot switch to other windows using {{key|Cmd}}+{{key|Tab}} on macOS.
|;prev
|268168|Chainmail armor texture broken due to armor material renaming.
|268172|Game crashes when saving an entity's effect is above 127.
}}</onlyinclude>
